IDLE

DIR
hat inc dec xdot torque
hat inc dec psi dot torque
joy left left mot
joy right right mot
a inc xdot torque
b dec xdot torque
y flip access
x error/init
sel change state
start read joystick.txt

SF
hat inc dec xdot torque
hat inc dec psi dot torque
joy left left mot
joy right right mot
a inc xdot torque
b dec xdot torque
y flip access
x error/init
sel change state
start read joystick.txt

VEL

hat inc dec xdot
hat inc dec psi dot
joy left psidot
joy right xdot
a inc xdot
b dec xdot 
y flip access
x error/init
sel change state
start read joystick.txt

POS

hat inc dec 
>>> change request for target coordinate
>>> you navigate with an extra dot in the x y plane and you can see the xy coordinate you are requesting, besides also being ablr to see the actual position aswell as the actual target coordinate

joy left change the target coordinate (this is equal to driving, and just giving the TWIPR a direction)

joy right change request for target coordinate (similarl to hat action)

a inc send request and update target coordinate

b reset target coordinate request (0,0)

y flip axes

x error/init

sel change state

start read joystick.txt
